dmca.title: PVA Corp. Requests Removal of Patent and Copyright Infringements
dmca.body:
PVA Enterprises Corporation
[private]
LaGrange Park, IL 60526
TEL XXX-XXX-XXXX FAX XXX-XXX-XXXX 
http://www.pvacorp.com

February 26, 2004

Google, Incorporated
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
FAX XXX-XXX-XXXX

Recently I e-mailed you about a firm by the name of 9Corp, web address.. http://www.9corp.com that has copied the verbiage of our website which is copyrighted, plus the technology is patented under US Patent Number 6,385,029.

There is not only direct copyright infringement by 9Corp, but another firm called Vortex, web address of... http://www.vortex.com which also comes up on the Google search engine. Vortex has violated a copyrighted article I did in January, 1996 that was done in Electrical Engineering Times

When one goes on Google, types in "Ground Transients" two sites come up which are Vortex and 9Corp.

The URL's on Google are as follows, plus are listed in the attached document which is a copy of the Google search page. They are as follows..

Examples

1.) www.vortextek.com/article-doing_battle_with_grnd-transients.pdf
	(pdf) Doing battle with ground transients

2.) www.vortextek.com/id12.html - 8k
	Vortex Technologies

3.) www.electronicstalk.com/news/cor/cor100.html - 8k
	Terminator suppresses transients from earth - 9 Corporation

4.) www.9corp.comm/technology.html - 17k
	9 Corporation - Redefining Reliability

I'm attaching a copy of the Google page showing these firms. Please refer to the asterisk (*) next to each location. The PVA website is... http://www.pvacorp.com

I would like to request that our URL be listed when one goes to the Google search engine and types in "Ground Transients"

I have conducted a search of Google.com using query "Ground Transients" and found that the first four items on the first page infringes upon copyrighted material and US Patent Number 6,395,029, owned by PVA Enterprises Corporation.

I request the URL's shown above as in examples numbered 1, 2, 3 and 4 be removed from the Google search engine,

" I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

Sincerely,

[private]
President & CEO
E-mail address: [private]@pvacorp.corn

Cc: [private] - legal counsel, Schoenberg, Fisher, Newman
	& Rosenberg. Ltd., Chicago, IL
